abstract: The committee wants Toyota and the highway safety agency to discuss when they first learned about potential safety defects and what they have done to resolve them.
snippet: The committee wants Toyota and the highway safety agency to discuss when they first learned about potential safety defects and what they have done to resolve them.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT  Toyota faced heightened scrutiny on Thursday over problems with the accelerator pedals on its vehicles, as a House committee scheduled Congressional hearings into the matter and its recalls expanded to Europe and China.

headline.main: U.S. House Committee Plans Hearing on Toyota Recall
headline.print_headline: Toyota Meets More Pressure, Now From Congress
